name: databases-starter-project
description: - Clone this repo  - Install the dependencies -  `npm install` - Rename `.env.example` to `.env`.  - **If you are using Atlas**, to host your DB you will need to update the `MONGODB_URI=<your database url>`. You should place `/wine` at the end of your connection url (e.g., `mongodb+srv://test:<password>@cluster0.x08wt.mongodb.net/wine?retryWrites=true&w=majority`)
